items.sentence: Tom doesn't think it's safe for you to do that.
Tom doesn't think I'll be permitted to do that.
Tom doesn't need me to do that for him anymore.
Tom doesn't know who can do that and who can't.
Tom doesn't know whether he can do that or not.
Tom doesn't have the time to do that right now.
Tom is likely to still be reluctant to do that.
Tom wanted to have his picture taken with Mary.
Tom worked in the garden while Mary made lunch.
Tom is the one who needs to make that decision.
I don't speak English as fluidly as Naomi does.
Why do you think that Tom hasn't done that yet?
I wish that I could go to the concert with you.
Tom usually doesn't drink as much as Mary does.
I tried to glue that broken vase back together.
My hope is that we'll be able to get that done.
I hope that we do things differently next time.
My hope is that we won't have to do this again.
I really do hope that you can come to my party.
Tom let us know that he didn't like to do that.
Tom let us know that he didn't like doing that.
I know that I can't do that as well as Tom can.
Tom will be hosting this year's family reunion.
I can still swim, but not as well as I used to.
How was Tom able to do that without assistance?
Tom has been seeing a psychiatrist once a week.
Neither Tom nor Mary has ever has been married.
What makes you think Tom was talking about you?
Tom is in the living room, asleep on the couch.
It's hard to believe that Tom is only thirteen.
I didn't know that you and Tom worked together.
No matter what Tom says, I'll do it my own way.
I guess these kinds of things sometimes happen.
I'll be in Australia for a few days next month.
I'd go to Australia with you if I had the time.
I went back to Australia last month for a week.
I'm likely to still be in Australia in October.
I'm going to get back from Australia on Monday.
It would be impossible to do that by ourselves.
I'm planning to send a birthday present to Tom.
I wonder if Tom wanted to go to Boston with us.
Tom didn't have any desire to return to Boston.

Tom is looking for someone to teach him French.

Tom should've stayed in Boston a few more days.

I was born in the same house as my grandfather.
Tom plays the viola much better than Mary does.
I'll never forget what Tom said to me that day.
